channel.title: News on Jacob's Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in News on Jacob's Thoughts

item.title: Coming soon
item.description: This is Jacob’s Thoughts, a brand new site by Jacob Ruan that’s just getting started. Things will be up and running here shortly, but you can subscribe in the meantime if you’d like to stay up to date and receive emails when new content is published!
item.content:encoded: This is Jacob’s Thoughts, a brand new site by Jacob Ruan that’s just getting started. Things will be up and running here shortly, but you can subscribe in the meantime if you’d like to stay up to date and receive emails when new content is published!
